entry.title: AI Can’t Write a Good Joke, Google Researchers Find
entry.summary: Working comedians used artificial intelligence to develop material, and found it to be “the most bland, boring thing.”

entry.title: Apple’s Big AI Upgrades Won't Launch in the EU This Year: Reports
entry.summary: Apple's AI features are not coming to the European Union as the tech giant says it won't “compromise the integrity of our products.”

entry.title: 50 Cent's Twitter Hacked to Promote Solana Meme Coin
entry.summary: Get rich and lie tryin'.

entry.title: Can the New Claude AI 3.5 Sonnet Model Beat ChatGPT-4o?
entry.summary: Anthropic says its Claude 3.5 Sonnet release is faster, cheaper, and beats OpenAI's latest model on most benchmarks. We put them to a head-to-head test.

entry.title: ‘Hamster Kombat’ Daily Cipher Guide: How to Use Morse Code to Earn a Million Free Coins in the Telegram Game
entry.summary: Now there’s another way to rack up free coins ahead of the Hamster Kombat airdrop. Here’s how to do it and where to find the latest code.

entry.title: Bitcoin Will Soar Thanks to Failing Japanese Banks, Says Arthur Hayes
entry.summary: Freshly printed U.S. dollars will be needed, so “buy the fucking dip,” he urges.

entry.title: Smart Watches Can Help Detect Parkinson’s Disease Earlier: Study
entry.summary: ”Off-the-shelf” wearables linked to a smartphone app could be useful in measuring disease progression, according to new research.

entry.title: Ethereum Fighting Game 'AI Arena' Sets NRN Token Launch
entry.summary: After a play-to-airdrop campaign this spring, Ethereum fighting game AI Arena is nearing its NRN token launch. Here's when it'll happen.

entry.title: GameStop Stock Slides Amid Options Chaos With Roaring Kitty MIA
entry.summary: GME shares kept ticking down Friday amid increased volatility around GameStop options and a continued no-show from influencer Roaring Kitty.

entry.title: Pacmoon Almost Solved Crypto’s SocialFi Problem—Then Elon Musk Crushed It
entry.summary: Blast meme coin Pacmoon appeared to solve a key problem that’s vexed crypto for years. The future was limitless—until a Twitter update undid everything.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 143 - CRYPTO TRENDS LOWER
entry.summary: Crypto sinks, ETFs see another $140m outflow. German government likely sells $195m more BTC. 100 day BTC break-out coming: Don Alt. SOL ETF applied for in Canada. Rumours SEC case vs Coinbase also dropped. Standard Chatered setup spot trading desk. ARB has record daily revenue on LayerZero claims. CFTC investigating Jump Crypto. FTM outperforms ahead of Sonic upgrade. Binance integrates USDT on TON. Onchain prediction market TVL continues to soar.

entry.title: The Week in Polkadot: $60 Million JAM Prize Fund Open for Applications
entry.summary: Polkadot developers ready to tackle the JAM implementation challenge will be eligible for up to $60m in prizes.

entry.title: Team Liquid, Community Gaming Plot Tournaments With USDC Payouts on Base
entry.summary: Teamfight Tactics and Hearthstone tournaments will pay players a total of $20,000 in prize money during Base’s On-Chain Summer II campaign.

entry.title: Ripple CEO Faces Trial Over Alleged 'Misleading Statements' in 2017 Interview
entry.summary: The charges take issue with the CEO saying he was "very, very long" on XRP. Plaintiffs allege he sold millions worth of XRP the same year.

entry.title: Bitcoin Dips 3.5% as German Government Sells $325 Million BTC Over Two Days
entry.summary: Bitcoin plunged 3.5% on Friday morning, likely still experiencing volatility from the German government selling $195 million the day before.

entry.title: Why Ethereum Derivatives Traders Are Deploying an Iron Condor Strategy
entry.summary: Traders have been using the $3,200 to $3,400 'lines-in-the sand' to define risk, Wintermute told Decrypt.

entry.title: Standard Chartered Is Creating a Bitcoin and Ethereum Trading Desk in London
entry.summary: British bank Standard Chartered is opening a spot Bitcoin and Ethereum trading desk, becoming one of the first in the world.

entry.title: Grayscale Ethereum Trust Faces 'Comparative Disadvantage' Without Staking: SEC Filing
entry.summary: Not being able to stake the Ethereum backing the Grayscale Ethereum Trust will "negatively affect the value of the shares," the firm wrote.

entry.title: Scammers Are Using AI Phishing and ‘Juice Jacking’ to Target Travelers
entry.summary: Email attacks are up 4,151%, says security firm SlashNext, as fake USB chargers threaten to steal smartphone data.

entry.title: Solana ETF Proposal Aims to Be First in North America
entry.summary: After Bitcoin and Ethereum ETF approvals in the United States, a firm aims to launch Canada's first Solana ETF. Can the U.S. be far behind?

entry.title: Meet the AI Wingman That Helps Dudes Get Dates
entry.summary: A burgeoning industry teaching men how to talk to women is taking off worldwide. What hath tech wrought?

entry.title: Sorry Dogecoin Fans: Elon Musk’s Twitter Payments Plan Doesn’t Include Crypto
entry.summary: Dogecoin supporter Elon Musk is working toward the launch of a Twitter payments service, but it reportedly doesn’t feature crypto for now.

entry.title: Winklevoss Twins Donate $2 Million in Bitcoin to Trump to Fight Biden's 'War on Crypto'
entry.summary: The Gemini co-founders said they sided with Donald Trump and donated $1 million in Bitcoin apiece to take down President Biden's re-election campaign.

entry.title: LayerZero Airdrop Is Creating Chaos for Polymarket Bettors
entry.summary: LayerZero Labs requiring a donation to receive ZRO tokens left Polymarket with a $680,000 wager disputed by its users.

entry.summary: Telegram’s hottest game is planning an airdrop via The Open Network (TON)—and Hamster Kombat has teased tips for yielding the best bag.

entry.title: Ethereum Preps for Primetime With TV Commercial Ahead of ETF Launch
entry.summary: Bitwise is again first to release an ETF ad—and they’re minting it as an NFT on Ethereum.

entry.title: What Is 'Yescoin'? The Telegram Tap-to-Earn Game and Airdrop Details
entry.summary: Telegram-based game Yescoin puts a sspin on the clicker genre, attracting 18 million players as a token airdrop looms.

entry.title: Leonardo AI Launches a New Model—Can It Dethrone Ideogram as Best Image Generator?
entry.summary: Leonardo AI's latest release, Leonardo Phoenix, brings a host of new features and improvements.

entry.title: Germany Begins Selling Its Bitcoin Billions, Triggering Volatility Fears
entry.summary: The German government is starting to sell off its stockpile of over $3 billion in seized Bitcoin, says Arkham. Will it tank the market?

entry.title: Tornado Cash Use Could Complicate CertiK's Defense Against Kraken ‘Extortion’ Claims
entry.summary: Blockchain sleuths have discovered that CertiK researchers engaged with U.S.-banned crypto mixer Tornado Cash after the "white-hat" Kraken hack.

entry.title: Bitcoin to $1 Million? These Analysts Think It Gets There—Eventually
entry.summary: Bernstein has doubled down on predictions that Bitcoin is about to surge to unprecedented highs—and may hit $200,000 in less than a year.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 142 - ETH LEADS THE RALLY
entry.summary: ETH continues to lead gains, SOL underperforms. BTC may rebound as Fed liquidity rips higher. ETH sees large amount of bullish call activity. LayerZero launches today, 25% unlock. Funding level the lowest in 3 months. German government sends 1000 BTC to exchanges. Stablecoins to become 10% of money: Circle CEO. Stabelcoin transfers up 16x in 4 years. BTC exchanges balances hit 3 year low. SOL again flips ETH for DEX volumes. Kraken reports $3m bug exploit found by CertiK. Debate about whether CertiK were whitehats. Jump Crypto gives $10m to crypto PAC. Binance launches HODLer airdrops. TipLink allows SOL transfers by email. ETHFI proposes 50% revenue for buybacks. JTO teases LSD backed stablecoin. JUP team proposes to reduce 30% of supply.

entry.title: GameStop Sinks as Meme Stock Trader Roaring Kitty Goes Quiet
entry.summary: Is this the end of the latest meme stock revival? GameStop shares keep dipping without Roaring Kitty to pump up traders.

entry.title: ‘Not Enough People’: This Robotics Company Is Tackling a Labor Shortage
entry.summary: Millions of manufacturing jobs are going unfilled, says the CEO of GrayMatter, which today announced raising $45 million to expand its manufacturing efforts.

entry.title: This Robotics Company Aims to Solve a Labor Shortage in Manufacturing
entry.summary: GrayMatter Robotics Co-founder and CEO Ariyan Kabir explains the origin of the company, the need for artificial intelligence and robotics to offset a growing labor shortage, and takes Decrypt on a tour of its AI-powered facility.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Just Bought Another $786 Million in Bitcoin
entry.summary: Michael Saylor’s software firm has purchased another huge sum of Bitcoin, widening its lead as the top corporate holder.

entry.title: NBCUniversal Will Continue Building on Aptos via Long-Term Agreement
entry.summary: Following “Exorcist” and “Renfield” experiences on Aptos, NBCUniversal will keep collaborating with Aptos Labs for years to come.

entry.summary: Telegram game PixelTap lets you battle robots to earn coins ahead of a token airdrop—and you can earn way more with this easy bonus.

entry.title: Ethereum Stays Above $3,500 as Open Interest Drops
entry.summary: Ethereum kept its ground above $3,500 as open interest drops—a sign that traders don't expect wild swings in either direction.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 141 - SEC DROPS ETH PROBE
entry.summary: BTC: 65.4k (0%), ETH: 3545 (+3%), SOL: 139 (+2%). Top Gainers: LDO, BRETT, PEPE, AR. ETH & beta lead gains after SEC headline. SEC drops probe into ETH as a security. BTC ETFs see another $152m outflow. Pantera show $100m buying interest in ETH ETF. Pantera aims to raise new $1bn fund. Lack of staking won’t harm ETH ETF: 21 Shares. LayerZero airdrop coming June 20th. SEC concerns on USDC may delay Circle IPO. Hayes increasing PENDLE & DOGE positions. Fox News to build L2 with Polygon. EIGEN trades at $10bn pre-market. Drift & Ondo partner on RWAs. Commercial real estate coming on-chain: KPMG.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 140 - MARKETS DOWN BAD
entry.summary: BTC touches 1-month lows, dominance hits 56%. $500m of liquidations in fall, $146m ETF outflows. VanEck to launch first ETF in Australia. Coinbase to launch pre-market trading. 56% of Fortune 500 building in web3. Uphold to delist USDT in EU due to MiCA. TON flips DOGE in sell-off. Base DEX users now 2nd place after SOL. Ethena launches staking & restaking with Symbiotic. Lens aiming to raise $50m at $500m valuation. Two ‘crazy’ MATIC announcements coming.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 139 - WHATS THE NEXT META?
entry.summary: BTC again breaks $66k, dominance rises. Fear & Greed index hits 3 month low. Whales continue to be in accumulation mode. Miners 33 days into capitulation, average 41 days. Financial advisors not buying BTC yet: BlackRock. Crypto funds saw $600m outflows last week. ZKsync airdrop live, prices at $5bn FDV. ZKsync defend sybil measures. Low float, high FDV coins get hammered again. Tether launches product backed by Gold. Korean exchanges reviewing 600 coins for delisting. ETH ETF ‘sell the rumour, buy the news event’. BTC ETF basis buyers roughly 15% of demand. CVX bounces 100% after loan liquidation. TON sees fastest user growth in crypto history. APT may flip SOL in 1-3 years: Hayes. Crypto lifetime funding eclipses $100bn. SEC claims $876m Ripple fine still fair. Gensler could cost Biden election: Cuban.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 138 - MORE CELEB COINS!
entry.summary: Altcoins bleed out heavy, BTC dominance rises towards 60%. Miners continue to be large BTC sellers, whales accumulate. ETF inflows slow, hedge fund allocations point to basis trades. ETH ETFs approvals see little movement, coming 'in the summer’. Stocks continue to hit ATHs as CPI & PPI both come in soft. TON performs best in L1s, active wallets eclipse ETH. Andrew Tate joins celebrity memecoin meta, DADDY hits $350m. SOL DEX volumes eclipse ETH in memecoin frenzy. Curve founder defaults on CRV debt as DeFi coins tumble. Terraform Labs & Do Kwon to pay $4.5bn fine to SEC. BAMK hits $350m in Runes as it issues BTC stablecoin. Gaming tokens face huge sell-off, PRIME changes tokenomics.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 137 - CRYPTO DIPS FURTHER
entry.summary: Crypto falls after slightly hawkish Fed speech. BTC whales buy $1.4bn in 24hrs. Miners continue to be large sellers of BTC. BTC ETFs see $100m inflows. MicroStrategy to raise $500m to buy BTC. Egorov CRV debt positions begin to liquidate . Circle to support SOL for wallets. 4% of Turkey GDP used to buy stablecoins. QuantMatter say $11m stolen from OKX account. Biden to use Coinbase for crypto donations. Terraform Labs & Do Kwon set to pay $4.5bn fine. Franklin Templeton write report on SOL DePin. TON flips ETH for active addresses. Moonpay & Paypal integration goes live in EU & UK.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 136 - FIRST MOTHER, NOW DADDY?
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see another $200m outflows. Another $190m of liquidations in volatility. $1.2bn BTC leaves exchanges in a day. ETF flows largely driven by basis trades: Pal. ‘Perfect setup’ for longs into macro news today. ETH ETF approvals ‘expected this month’. Crypto in best place it has ever been: Circle CEO. China’s ICBC calls ETH ‘digital oil’. Trump wants ‘made in the USA’ BTC. Crypto hacks $19bn since 2011. Symbiotic restaking protocol sees $150m inflows. Polygon launches $720m grants program. ZKsync accused of insider allocations. CRV drop leaves $90m loans at risk.

entry.title: Has AI Already Changed Gaming Forever?
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Sander Lutz and Rug Radio creator Puke sat down with Simon Davis of Mighty Bear Games and VC Kyle Klemmer to discuss how AI has already remade the gaming industry—for better and for worse.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 135 - BTC FALLS ON OUTFLOWS
entry.summary: Crypto falls as ETFs see first outflow in 19 days. Short positions grow on downwards move in BTC. BTC short-term realised price now at $64k. ETH ETF issuers still waiting for SEC response. UK ETNs continue to see tiny volume. SOL validators get kicked out for sandwich attacks. ZKsync airdrop happening next week. ZKsync to give 17.8% to the community. OP launches Fraud Proofs. Bitfarms plans poison pill to counter takeover bid. OKX sees outflows after security incidents. Bybit considers shutting China offices. COIN may get added to S&P500.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 134 - EU SNAP ELECTIONS LAND
entry.summary: Volatility remains low, TL continues to be divisive. 2nd highest weekly close ever for BTC. Crypto funds saw $2bn inflows last week. Rumour that BlackRock will apply for SOL ETF. Base TVL hits $8bn, top of L2s for activity. zk Sync hint at TGE this week. PENDLE enters top 5 for DeFi TVL. Berachain v2 testnet goes live.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 133 - RUGGED BY HOGEN?
entry.summary: BTC still just below ATH after $218m ETF inflows. BTC OI hits record $37bn as long-short ratio rises. Amount of ETH on exchanges lowest since 2015. Franklin Templeton explores broader crypto fund. Mining stocks rise on takeover frenzy. Kraken considers $100m funding round. Binance reinstates crypto buys with Mastercard. Phantom & Jito partner for native staking.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 132 - CRYPTO STRENGTH IS GROWING
entry.summary: Crypto consolidates near ATH, $488m ETF inflow. BTC correlation to tech stocks highest since 2023. BTC options anticipate $74-80k move. ETH to $22k by 2030: VanEck. Robinhood to acquire Bitstamp. Coinbase launches Smart Wallet. ByBit opens up explicitly to China users. Global liquidity breaks out to $94T. US President given new powers to block crypto. Cramer & Gensler continue to bash crypto. Gensler hints at prolonged ETH ETF process. Stand with Crypto PAC hits 1m advocates. Turkey denies plans to tax crypto. EigenLayer surpasses $20bn TVL. IONET to launch on Binance.

entry.title: Webinar: Unleashing The Power Of Permissionless Markets With Vega Protocol
entry.summary: Join our expert panel for an insightful discussion on Vega Protocol's revolutionary approach to decentralized derivatives trading. Discover how Vega's permissionless markets enable anyone to create and trade futures and perpetuals on a fully decentralized network. Explore the potential of Vega's innovative features, such as the ability to add new assets, transfer network assets, and adjust network parameters—as well as the protocol's active markets.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 131 - BIG BITCOIN INFLOWS!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see large $900M inflows, biggest in weeks. $800M of shorts would be liquidated above $72K. BTC to $100K if it breaks $73K in a week: Novogratz. BNB hits new ATH, breaks $100B market cap. FTX reaches $200M tax settlement with IRS. Most investors should hold BTC: Fidelity. Tether CEO criticises EU on stablecoin regulation. Japanese exchange raises $320M to recover funds. ETH ETFs could see $4B inflows in 5 months: K33. Paradigm propose MEV taxes. StarkWare plans ZK scaling for BTC.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 130 - $DOG TARGETS 1B MC
entry.summary: Runes & Ordinals soar as DOG passes $900M. rekt Brands opens up its shares claim for NFT holders. BTC led NFT trading volume with $6.3M on the day. NodeMonkes +10% 0.289, Puppets +35% at 0.198. Runes up by DOG which soared 23% to $922M mc. BUS won the Blast Jackpot last night for a 3% win. Memecoin majors are mostly red this AM. Trader buys 10k SOL of GME. Base brings back Onchain Summer. Dapper settles massive lawsuit.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 129 - ROARING RETURNS, AGAIN!
entry.summary: Crypto bounces, BTC breaks 2-week downtrend. BTC low volatility points to trend continuation. BTC will top at $150k in September 2025: Brandt. $3bn ETH withdrawn from exchanges since ETF. ETH ETF inflows imply ‘base case’ price $5.3k. ETH ETF inflows won’t be like BTC: Fireblocks. BTC logo projected on ECB building. Ethena USDe hits $3bn market cap in 4 months. Maple launches DeFi institutional lending platform. OKX launches in the Netherlands. Matter Labs drops ZK ticker. Linea shuts down chain after hack.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 128 - PUMP DOT FUN KEEPS PUMPING!
entry.summary: Crypto nears break-out then falls on Trump verdict. 13 straight days of BTC ETF inflows, BTC whale accumulation ‘echoes 2020’. Crypto apps next year will onboard millions: Burniske. Elon denies talking crypto policy with Trump. RFK has bought 21 BTC during campaign. TON market cap falls after updating supply data. a16z donates $25m to crypto PAC. Vitalik sends 30ETH to Tornado devs. DBS Bank in Singapore custodies $650m ETH. Backlash grows over zkSync using ZK ticker. Implementing FIT21 a slow process: CFTC. Pierce recommends UK & US cross-border sandbox. Vitalik writes blog on block size wars. Hong Kong government expresses support for web3. Do Kwon & Terraform reach settlement with SEC. Large unlocks for a number of alts next month.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 127 - CELEB COINS CRASH!
entry.summary: NYSE to launch BTC options. CME has ‘no plans’ to offer SOL futures. Stablecoin market cap rises to 2 year high. Inflation below 3.3% ‘means BTC ATH’. Crypto market cap heading to $200T: Yat Siu. Gemini recovers $2.2bn for Earn users. PayPal stablecoin will offer ‘confidential transfers’. Mastercard launches Crypto Credential pilot on BTC. Layer Zero launches on SOL. L2s are cultural extensions of ETH: Vitalik. FTX’s Salame says he will share story. SEI announces 27m SEI airdrop. ASI merger complete, to launch June 13th.
